videos.description: Caleb Martin races to the hoop in transition, but Reggie Jackson meets him at the rim with the block.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Reggie Jackson gets way up to deny Caleb Martin) 2021/5/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Reggie Jackson gets way up to deny Caleb Martin
